plot outline: A man in his forties faces the realization that he cannot write in Bengali any more. In an attempt to regain his abilities to write in Bengali, he visits a psychiatrist. So to find out the root psychological problem, psychiatrist asks him to narrate his life, his dreams and his frustrations. The story is about his efforts to regain his ability of writing in Bengali.
title: Baari Tar Bangla
plot: A man in his forties faces the realization that he cannot write in Bengali any more. In an attempt to regain his abilities to write in Bengali, he visits a psychiatrist. So to find out the root psychological problem, psychiatrist asks him to narrate his life, his dreams and his frustrations. The story is about his efforts to regain his ability of writing in Bengali.::Sourav Das
